item.title: Drive Failure and reinstall
item.description: Hi, This weekend was one of thoses weekend … Sunday morning while trying to destroy an unused jail i got a zfs warning: “pool is degraded”. As it turn out i was missing a drive in my zfs mirror setup, so heck .. no fun. After a few email with the hosting company they recommended i migrate over a new server, which is running ok if you’re reading this ;).
